Material
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Property (Items/Equipment): Material
By Trickster on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 02:29 pm:

Materials are used in Combining at the Item Shops, to create other more useful items and equipment. They can be found by your monster on an Adventure, found in treasure chests, or received after defeating an enemy monster.

Each material has a level, 1-4 (except Anc. Relic, which has sizes S, M, L, and Sp). Higher numbers mean higher quality. A new, combined item takes its quality from the average (rounded down) of its ingredients.

Materials:

  • Flower
  • Nut
  • Branch
  • Meat
  • Fish
  • Fruit
  • Clam
  • Fossil
  • Feather
  • Horn
  • Fur
  • Insect
  • Water
  • Liquid
  • Gas
  • Clay
  • Stone
  • Ore
  • Gem
  • Orb
  • Spirit
  • Tablet
  • Metal
  • Element
  • Anc. Relic
